title: Love Island intruder Anna McEvoy shows off her incredible figure in steamy lingerie photoshoot
text:
She's the blonde bombshell set to cause a stir on Love Island Australia this week, being an intruder.

And 'all Aussie sweetheart' Anna McEvoy has set pulses racing, posing up for a steamy lingerie photoshoot for This is Bad Wolf.

The 27-year-old shows off her incredible figure in the racy snaps and can be seen modelling a variety of looks, including a red G-string and a matching sheer bra.

Red hot! Love Island intruder and 'all Aussie sweetheart' Anna McEvoy shows off her incredible figure in a G-string and sheer bra... as she completes a steamy lingerie photoshoot

Her set includes cut-out detailing on the hips and a bra with bustier-style detailing.

The stunner can be seen showing off a golden tan and wears her blonde locks out and over her shoulders.

She wears makeup including dewy foundation and a nude lip.

Racy! Her set includes cut-out detailing on the hips and a bra with bustier-style detailing

She's a babe! The former Miss Universe finalist also wears a racy black set, which featured a G-string with multiple straps around the waist and a triangle bra

The former Miss Universe finalist also wears a racy black set, which featured a G-string with multiple straps around the waist and a triangle bra.

In another snap, the reality star poses alongside another blonde beauty, with Anna wearing a white lingerie set.

Anna entered the Love Island Australia villa on Wednesday, alongside credit analyst Phoebe, 28.

Stunner: She wears makeup including dewy foundation and a nude lip in the photoshoot

Looking alright in white! In another snap, the reality star poses alongside another blonde beauty, with Anna wearing a white lingerie set

New girl: Anna entered the Love Island Australia villa on Wednesday, alongside credit analyst Phoebe, 28

She has only been single for 10 months after her six-and-a-half year relationship came to an end.

In a sneak preview of Thursday's show, Anna's entrance leaves model Matthew Zukowski's head reeling.

He looks pleasantly surprised to see her and admits he'd messaged Anna just weeks before entering the villa.
description: She's the blonde bombshell  set to cause a stir on Love Island Australia this week, being an intruder.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
